website_summaries.verdict: This frustration-free protector will safeguard your Apple Watch screen against scratches, scuffs, and much more.
pros: Glass-like surface ensures your Apple Watch screen will continue to deliver superior image quality
Laser-cut protector provides maximum screen coverage
Flexible screen protector is designed to withstand impact
cons: Air bubbles tend to form under the screen protector
Less durable than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Apple watch. Within 1 month I am on the 3rd protector. They don't stay on. The first one came off when it was in my bag and stuck to some plastic. The second one had a corner lift off and got full of lint, which made it hard to see and didn't stay on. I registered for the lifetime warranty so when I put the 3rd one on I emailed the company about my disappointment. I was promptly offered a replacement or refund. I took the refund and will look for another product since I don't want to go through 2 every month.
customer_reviews.author: Bike, Run, Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Protector!
customer_reviews.text: This product came very nicely packaged and included all that was in the description! I love that it was easy to install but I would definitely recommend watching the instructional video because that was very helpful. This is not a slap it on and go application, you have to have patience and feel free to watch the video multiple times or pause it to catch up. I did this before going to sleep so that I wouldn't be tempted to touch it and so far so good! It fits very nicely and there are no bubbles. The fact that it comes with 5 others just in case is great too. I would reccommend this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Harrington

customer_reviews.title: ... product and thought I could just slap it on like I do the one for my phone
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product and thought I could just slap it on like I do the one for my phone. Nope... thank goodness they provide multiple protectors AND an easy to follow installation video. I watched it twice and installed my protector like a pro. Looks great! I’ve used their protectors on my phone for years so I trust the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Saleschick

customer_reviews.title: Totally crappy product. A child’s play sticker for your screen
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never started a review quite like this. Here goes. This item is crap. It’s a sticker you put on the screen of you Apple Watch. The sticker is mostly clear but prone o bubbles. The material is flimsy. The effect is to take your brilliant high resolution watch face and cover it with a food wrap. If my dog had a watch I wouldn’t recommend this product to protect its face. This is total junk with a seducing high tech pitch and the implications it was like glass. It’s really more like toilette paper. I’ll take the risk of scratches before suffering this totally worthless product
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Apple Watch 3 38mm. Photo is 4th protector in 4 days. Does not stick around edges so it lifts off easily. Instructions were straightforward and simple. I tried everything I could think of to get this thing to stick. It just refuses to adhere to the edges of the device. Might work better on the larger watch face or if it’s dimensions were just a hair smaller so it doesn’t have to adhere to the curves. I might try cutting to fit better on my next attempt. Screen protector is a cellophane type of material. It does not affect touch screen function.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Has to dry for 12 hours. Not easy to get aligned properly. Feels rubbery.
customer_reviews.text: There's a video to watch in which you learn you must let the film dry for 12 hours. Follow all the steps to keep it dust-free, examine it closely before putting it aside to dry because there will be an annoying bubble if there's even the most minute speck.Took two tries, even being super cautious because no matter how wet it is, it will adhere to the watch immediately and be all but impossible to slip around, though the video shows it doing just that. Nope. It will dry nicely and be invisible, but feels a tad sticky.
customer_reviews.author: CiscoD

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to install but once reading directions and seeing video it wasn’t bad. It makes the face more sensitive to touch so it somewhat works better than it did. I would definitely buy this again. Buying a new watch only due to a scratched face it a ton more expensive. I am a nurse and pretty hard on my watches so it is important that I protect it early.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't have an engineering degree
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! What did I get myself in to? I ordered these protective covers. They arrived in a bubble envelope, but the box was semi-crushed anyway. When I opened the box, there was a bewildering display of gadgets and gizmos I need to put the thing on my watch! I repeat... I don't have an engineering degree, though I am a retired teacher, and therefore educated and fairly bright. Knowing my limitations, I packed the whole kit and kaboodle up until I next see my 13-year old granddaughter. I will boost her self-esteem and feelings of superiority and have her install the silly thing!
customer_reviews.author: tamaraH612

customer_reviews.title: Wet install is great
customer_reviews.text: The wet install is weird because we’ve always learned to not get liquid on our electronics, but the wet install makes it really easy to put the protector on perfectly. The video is a good example of how you should install it. The protector is clear (after the 24 hours it takes to dry.. there’s some bubbles in the beginning but wait for it to disappear) & sometimes I forget I even have a protector on because it looks so good. It fits the screen perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Klingon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Easy to install on your screen and protects it from falls which is great! I also took a chance and tried scratching the screen protector to see if it would ruin my screen but NOPE! Love that this set comes with everything you need for a perfect installation. It also comes with extra protectors Incase you mess up first one and need another. Very long lasting and durable. I also like that you can use the screen wiper for my glasses! Lol yes I tried cause my glasses were dirty. The reason I have rated it to stars though, is because the after Some time, the screen protector starts to peel off easily.
customer_reviews.author: JhMeSI

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen OK but installation doesn't work 100%
customer_reviews.text: Sticker doesn't fully stick at the edges, leaving exposed sticker in the corner, which makes it obvious that there is something stuck on your watch (and not something of good quality). Not discreet at all, and takes away from the look of the Apple Watch (it feels like you are wearing a piece of junk). Touch screen works fine, and if I had kept this on my watch perhaps I could've tested the protection from scratches, but my Watch looked too hideous with this on. I'd rather take the risk than use this!
customer_reviews.author: SMik

customer_reviews.title: Hardly noticeable when installed correctly
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wouldn’t write a review for a screen protector, they’re pretty standard. But I was very impressed by these ones. It came with a bunch of little accessories to help with a good application and if you watch the video it has very detailed instructions. When I peeled off the final layer I legitimately thought the screen protector didn’t apply because it was so clear. The only problem I had was putting my watch into a case/wristband it peeled up a corner so I had to redo it and be very careful popping it into the case. Overall very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Buy this brand!
customer_reviews.text: Got the 6 pack for our 3 apple watches. This is my 3rd time buying screen protector for our watches. The other brands didnt work out for us. I didnt have much hope for this but took a chance since Im sure it's a matter of time before my daughter scratch her watch. Anyways, took me a while to apply the screen, I was more patient this time, kept smooth it with my fingers and eventually, it stayed nicely without any bubble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: My old screen protector was thin plexiglass. Loved it but it after four years it was scratched and the edges were dirty. I ordered this product to replace it. It was terrible to install. I struggled with it and never got the bubbles out after many swipes with their cardboard square. It was work to rub down the edges that have to curve around the watch face too. I think it’s stuck down now so all I have left to do is wait 12 hours when the bubbles will magically disappear. I hope. In short I’d not buy these again and the rest of the covers will go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Catty

customer_reviews.title: Long install time, questionable durability, great multi pack price
customer_reviews.text: These are great at keeping scratches from daily wear and tear off your screen. It comes with clear instructions for install. However, it is a long, multi step process, and it’s recommended to wait over night before wearing your watch again which is inconvenient. I also have my doubts as to how much damage the screen protector will defend the watch screen from. Even after only a couple of weeks and careful, thorough installation, I can see where my protector is wanting to come up and tear at the edges. It makes me glad it came in a six pack!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: stick on film, hard to install
customer_reviews.text: These are not what I expected. I thought it would be more of a glass protector similar to a screen protector on a phone. This is a stick-on film. It was a pain to install. Thankfully you get 6 because I ruined 3 before I got the 4th one to stick. Thankfully it wasn’t expensive. Hopefully it will stay on and won’t scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst purchases I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is literally just a bunch of films, it’s just cheap film which reminds me of the filmy sticker you pull off of the face of your watch when it’s new. I fail to see how this is going to protect anything. That said, I do see why they give you so many of them! Aside from the fact this must’ve cost about 3 cents to make (heck the packaging must’ve cost more than the actual product) you will Never get the bubbles out of the film - ever! I feel like I may as well have just thrown $10 down the toilet, ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clear

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: The protector fits the Apple Watch 3 very well and it really does protect my screen from scratches. It can be challenging to install but the video they have created with instructions is extremely helpful. I took off a star because the protector always starts to detach from the edges and it doesn’t look as clean so I eventually have to remove it and place a new one. The packet includes multiple protectors so you’ll always have back ups if you mess up placing it on the screen or if the protector begins to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: nvp

customer_reviews.title: Not made to use with a bumper.
customer_reviews.text: “Case friendly” is a lie. The case I had on the body of the watch just pushed this screen protector up and caused an adhesive to come off on the watch face. Worked fine otherwise, but not built to work with bumpers or the edges of the watch face. I imagine without a bumper, the rounded edges would just make the screen protector come up anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Strong as steel!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Samsung Gear 2 smartwatch for almost 5 years now, and have gone through many glass covers. These have saved the watch face many times. I recently tried this one, and this is the ONLY one I will use in the future. I don't know what this is made of, but it wears like steel! Bumps and scrapes that would have ruined the other screen protectors don't seem to have any impact on this one. It is as clear today as it was when I put it on the watch months ago!
customer_reviews.author: Ysabel Kid

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever purchased from Amazon. The video instructions that it tells you to go watch are not verbal and not in English. The protectors do not go on as easy as the video shows. You get six protectors in total and I used up all six and none of them would adhere to the surface of the watch. I ordered the 38mm witch is what my watch uses and they do not work. Very difficult to get them to stick with the liquid and you can’t get the bubbles out with out it slipping off the watch face. Don’t t buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marco A Lopez

customer_reviews.title: It’s not glass it’s rubbery plastic
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install. I thought I bought tempered glass but was mistaken. I am very uneasy about having plastic on my watch instead of glass. I hope I am not disappointed. The scratches on the top are already on my watch. The line in the middle is from the screen protector. I tried to get it off but it wouldn’t come off. So if it bugs me I have 5 more to try 😉. Hopefully it works well. I have a job out in the coal mine as a laborer and it always get hit. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Shana5569

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Watch the video and take your time. Do it right the first time and you won't have to use up all 6 like I did. :) Overall this is perfect to keep scratched off your watch. I got a deep scratch while hiking when I first bought my watch. Placed this one on my watch and it protected it ever since. I decided to leave it overnight to dry for at least 12 hours after you press down on the edges. It'll give it more time to solidify and stick on to the watch. Good luck and remember to be patient and take your time putting it.
customer_reviews.author: Toua

customer_reviews.title: Worth it - protect your watch!
customer_reviews.text: These protectors are great; the only issue I had is that it’s a little tricky to get installed. I probably went through three before getting one on correctly and in a manner that would stay (this was after watching the directional video multiple times and drying instruction). It’s just a little tricky because of the adhesive spray, but I’ve had the same one on for probably around 3 months and just now needing to change. It has definitely protected it from bumps and scratches. It still looks pretty good but has started to come up around the edges a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good protection.
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector will protect against scratches on your screen but I don’t think it would do much to protect from a fall. You have to look at the video to see how to install it otherwise it won’t be done correctly. Once Installed it was undetectable on the screen. It did start to lift after a couple of days and I have to replace it. Once it lifts on the side it won't stick down again and went through the pack of 6 pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ECPone

customer_reviews.title: Corners will not stick
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I could not get these screen protectors to stick around the corners of the screen. I tried multiple different applications(good thing it is a pack of 6) and every time the corners would come UN stuck no matter what I did. I watched the application video more than once and followed step by step but nothing helped. Also, the material of the protector picks up scratched very easily and looks dirty after only a couple days. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works fine...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but be sure and watch the video and follow their instructions exactly. It’s a bit of a process to get a good fit. My only complaint is that the screen cover itself gets dinged up easily, I go through them quickly because I can’t stand to see a scuff on the screen and the edges start to peel up within a few weeks of constant wear and I’m too particular to leave it. Therefor I go through a package fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: jburn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen protector! After watching the video is actually really easy to install. I had no issues and no bubbles on my first try! Covers the entire screen of my watch so I know it’s protected. And they give u 6 protectors so for this price u can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: lakisha turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, but watch the video. You will not get it right if you don’t. The QR code took me to the wrong site, it wanted a credit card! Used website address and ultimately got to right place, however there is no “video 2” listed so you have to search through the list for the correct one. Expensive for what you get, probably will never use six even if you mess one up like I did, but a nice protective solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage daughter to protect her apple watch. She went through several of them trying to put them on, I don't know how much of that was a teenager being in a hurry and not reading the instructions and how much was the fault of the product. She has had the same one on for eight months with no scratches or problems, she is fairly active. I would definitely recommend and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DRShopper

customer_reviews.title: Corners come up
customer_reviews.text: Install a bit of a hassle. Good touch screen response. Comes w 3 sets of prep supplies, even though there are 6 protectors. I’ve been wearing for about a week and the protector dies already show a couple scratches, though I am pretty rough w my watch. My biggest complaint is the corners have already started to come up-though maybe my application wasn’t perfect. I have not tried to replace it yet.
customer_reviews.author: pamtish

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: These were super easy to put on and use while on my watch. I was able to swip my screen and use all of my functions while this was one. It is easy to remove and replace when needed. I’m glad that it comes with several in the pack for backups. Make sure you clean your screen first before putting this one and then it will look perfect and smooth. However, three stars because it does start to come off after a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is really hard to put on the screen of my Apple Watch. There’s a link so buyers follow instructions on how to install the screen protector. WASTE OF TIME! I typed in the link and a lot of advertisements popped up! CLICK BAIT! There was no video! Waste of money and time. That’s why the sell 8 pieces you at least need 7 pieces to try and see how it really looks. Should’ve read the reviews....
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Stop! Don’t touch that dial!
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the worst item I have ever ordered from Amazon. I should have been discouraged when I noticed they actually recommend watching an install video. Kind of like a manual on steroids. Yes you can get the bubbles out real easy with the liquid install but the edge never lays flat. So it is only $10.00. It’s the principle of the matter. Normally I wouldn’t waste any more time with the return but this irritated me to the point I am taking the time to do just that.
customer_reviews.author: OCastro

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE! I even watched the video multiple times
customer_reviews.text: Update: February 4,2019 I watched the video and on my 3rd try I thought I did it well. It was down with NO loose edges, and now it’s already peeling off. Don’t waste your money. These are TERRIBLE! I watched the video and I had still had difficulties. I’m glad they sent 6 screen protectors, because I used 2 immediately. I was hoping these would last a while having 6 screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wineinger

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to install but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Ok. This is a little hard to install but so far I love it. It took three tries, but it finally worked! It looks clear, it doesn’t affect the function of the screen at all. So far I’m satisfied.. I will update my review after having it a few weeks. I noticed that putting the screen protector on the screen right after adding the liquid solution just didn’t work. I raised the protector so it could dry a little and then placed it on the screen and it actually started sticking to it. Just a little tip! Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: vilma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect iWatch Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: Chose this one as a replacement for another different failing protector film - liked this one because it only went to edge and didn’t try to curve over on my Apple Watch (which is why the other one failed!). Install video was very helpful (multi step process is simple, easy to understand/follow and VERY thorough) and film seems to adhere well, covers the entire screen as promised!! Want to give it it a full 24 hours before I put the rubber bumper edge protector back on but touch screen seems quite sensitive, it is very clear, no bubbles - so glad I chose this to protect my watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Just Ask Kaaren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about the installation process. I watched the video and it seemed very easy so I gave it a shot and it was VERY easy to do. It oooks great on my Apple Watch—you cannot tell it’s there which is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Q

customer_reviews.title: Worth a few bucks because your Apple Watch WILL scratch despite apples claims!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, comes with lots of accessories and resources to make install easy. They are plastic protectors so you do get a little bit of that ripple look that also makes the screen look not quite as sharp but you don’t notice it after a bit. Worth it since I scratched my watch screen twice quite badly in the first month from just normal wear. Should have bought these to begin with!
customer_reviews.author: HisNameWasSethRich

customer_reviews.title: Is not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is THE WORST product I have ever bought in amazon, first I thought it was a hard screen protector, second is too thing is REALLY difficult to apply, I damaged 2 before even putting it on the screen, it doesn’t protect ANYTHING, I’m just so disappointed, do not buy this. I tried my bet to apply it and look at all the bubbles in my screen, I won’t be even using it, I’m going to peal it off, and is not that a pay 1 dollar for this and plus shipping, I just feel robed. Very mad.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, easy to put on after video
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend-thought it might be complicated to put on but the video was very straightforward and made it very easy to get it on the watch. Removing the watch and was not necessary for me but the video has that as the first step-I am around young children all day and my watch has many opportunities to get touched or wet or accidentally bumped in a door frame but this prevents scratches-great product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Chumbler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Installation went nothing like the video. The numbered tabs pull off without the sheet that is suppose to follow it. The squeegee did nothing and was totally useless. I ruined two of the screen protectors with neither adhering to my watch face. The adhesive on the foam pad used to anchor the watch stuck all over the back of my watch and to the counter top I was working on. Not only did I not get protection for my watch, I now have a big mess to clean up as well. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Kjbrew

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay down at edges.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was great that this came with 6! I put one on, following directions. The edges didn’t stay down so tried a second one and I knew these were no good. I’m throwing away the rest. I knew I should’ve stuck with the brand I’d already tried- buy Armorsuit brand watch covers, not these! One Armorsuit iWatch screen protectors stays on many months without anyone being able to tell you have a screen protector on!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fail. Absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.text: This product DOES NOT WORK. We followed the instruction video exactly and our device covers came off within a week....for all three in the package. Absolute waste of money. Installation is a pain, the edges of the cover never quite adhere to the rounded edges, the struggle is not worth the week of the protection. WE DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Colene

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: Watched video on how to put screen protector on my new Apple Watch. Followed the directions to a ‘t’. The screen protector does not fit the screen on my 38mm watch face. The protector is too big and hangs over the edge just a few mm’s but it is obvious and will probably pull up easily. The overhang will not stay down on the curve of the watch face. Don’t waste your money on these, especially since they are not able to be returned. Shame on Amazon as labeling this as an ‘Amazon Choice’ product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommamac

customer_reviews.text: my coworker recommended these, I wouldn't recommend this brand, the surface of this watch screen protector got all scratch up and I eventually took it off within a month of it being on my watch. When you are applying it for the first time its best to not touch your watch for 24 hours, but I had to go back every hour to make sure all the edges were staying down, because they kept lifting on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding down the plastic helps the best
customer_reviews.text: So i installed the plastic and there is a bit of an overhang when you install, its EASILY overcome by cpping your hand and holding it for about 30 seconds. This creates a nice seal, its almost like you are cupping the screen protector onto the face. I did it for 2 of the watches and it worked like a charm. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Mirabal

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation- Great price for pack!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product for the great value for my apple watch series 3. There was instructions to watch the video and I highly recommend it. The installation was really easy and I like how it came with a spray bottle instead of wipes to help with the installation. No air bubbles on my first try and look forward into my purchase. Had it on for over a week now and am highly satisfied. No dirt or oil marks from my fingers so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jadelyn Waters

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: I love this little protector! With my series 1 Apple Watch years ago, I tried the face protectors that fit over the whole watch. What a disaster! They held moisture, looked clunky, and took away the beauty of the watch. I threw them away! With this, I get the protection from scratches that I want and you can’t even tell it’s there! Super easy to apply too! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davila

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Between my daughters and my watch we have already gone through all 6 in 3 months. I followed the instructions exactly and they lasted about 2-3 weeks each. It didn’t work well with the speigen case for the one watch. I ended up cutting that film shorter since the case protects the side of the watch. All the films have eventually either pealed up around the corners or eventually formed bubbles. The watch isn’t scratched but it’s not worth the effort to put on a new film every 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Monarch gardener

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This was no an easy screen protecter to install on my Apple Watch 3. I had to go to the video website that was provided with the package to see how to install. Very flimsy and not well made. I followed the instructions to a T and corners started peeling up which have cause major air bubbles within a couple days. I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: In the product description, it is described as a wet install screen protector. Upon receiving the product, I quickly discovered it was in fact not a wet install screen protector. I decided to try out the product anyways and was very disappointed. After many failed attempts, (every time even after following your instructions exactly there were still multiple air bubbles and the edges of your protector did not fold down properly onto the Apple Watch), the fifth protector applied semi-well (though there were still multiple air bubbles). Not only was the description of the product inaccurate, but of the 6 provided protectors, 4 were dust contaminated and couldn’t be correctly applied.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t easy to install. I say that because, it tells you to go to a link and watch the video. What I received was completely different from the video. However, I did manage to figure it out on my own after wasting 2 of them. So fingers crossed I did it right. Other than that it seems to be holding up against my natural nails which are sharp at the moment. So As of now I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Porter-Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the screen protector on for a week or so but I have been very impressed thus far! The packaging was very nice and all seems high quality. I had never seen or attempted a wet instillation before but the instructions (as well as instructional video) were very clear and made it super easy to figure out and install flawlessly. I haven’t had any issues with it and don’t expect to. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Install...but watch video for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Well...I’ve only just installed tonight, but I can say without hesitation that the installation was very easy if you watch the video and follow it closely. The protector easily attached and didn’t slip around too much. The edges took a little more work to get them to adhere ... but seem to be holding. As instructed, I’ve installed before bed...so looking forward to seeing what it looks like in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaDance

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a pack of screen protectors, of this same brand but it was the old yellow packaging and that pack lasted me a while! After I peeled off the last one, I put off ordering more (just being lazy) and do have a few scratches. I'm very surprised that although I have some scratches, the protector went on smoothly and when touching the screen protector I can barely feel them! So far very impressed and happy. Also, this pack came pretty fast considering the time we're in. I followed along with the YouTube video and the screen protector was on perfectly! I'm very satisfied and can worry less about my screen getting more scratched. :)
customer_reviews.author: Yaraiza Avalos-Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Apply
customer_reviews.text: This product was used on a 38 mm Series 3 Apple watch. The link to the video showing the installation process is really helpful, making application easy. After the protector is installed you can't even tell it's there. Protector film appears to be thick; I was concerned that it might show after application or alter the appearance of the face. My wife was really pleased, after allowing the product to dry completely, the protector was virtually invisible and the screen appearance was unchanged.
customer_reviews.author: KAM     Lake Park. NC

customer_reviews.title: Think this will work nicely
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video on you tube to install. It’s not hard but never would have installed correctly with out watching. And recommends doing and leaving over night. The edges are down on the watch but I can feel them and worry they might peel back easy when caught on something. But has a clean clear bubble free face on the screen. I think I will like.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and does the job, but NOT for long!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, this screen protector looked great and you couldn’t even tell there was a screen protector on my watch. However, my husband and I both purchased this product and had the same experience with these either peeling away from the edges or small nicks or bubbles appearing after a week or so. The bubbles seemed especially odd since they were installed with no bubbles. Also, I wouldn’t mind the multiple steps it takes to apply these if they lasted, however, after replacing these so many times within a short period, it has become annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jendoe

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s really a nice product if you’re looking for something to protect the screen of your Apple Watch, the installation video is very easy to follow and gives You instructions on how to apply the screen protector on your Apple Watch, so far I haven’t had any problems with it. Looks really nice on my watch, can barely tell there’s a protector on it. I definitely recommend it it you’re looking for something affordable and durable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Akubuiro

customer_reviews.title: Saving my Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is my third Apple Watch, and it’s the first time I’ve used a screen protector. It was super easy to install, and by watching the video, I was able to apply the screen protector with no bubbles or specks of dust. The watch works perfectly with the screen protector. It has made such a difference! No tiny scratches that cloud the screen and ultimately cause the screen to be less sensitive. The delivery was super fast, and the customer service after the purchase was amazing! They are kind, quick to answer messages, and incredibly supportive. The LK Screen Protector is saving my watch screen from all of the damage my other watches suffered.
customer_reviews.author: Jen angelini

customer_reviews.title: Good value and simple install, if you watch the video.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as expected, was easy to install after review of video, mighty helpful. I haven't tested the durability for scratch resistance just yet, however, it seems to be the same quality as my iPhone glass protector. I am pleased with this purchase for both ease of installation, quality of product thus far, and quantity of replacement skins.
customer_reviews.author: c.weaver

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in your watch. Watch the instructional video first! These have saved my watch face so many times. I didn’t realize how much I bumped my watch into things until I put one of these on my watch and saw all the scuff marks. I like that you get more then one protector as well. Will order again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Shandra

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. I liked that it had video instruction versus a manual or infographic. It was much more clear to follow the video. The touch screen is still as sensitive to touch and it provides protection. I know I didn't do the greatest job sealing the edges of the protector so you can see the edge of the film, but it really doesn't bother me. I'd rather have my screen protected from deep scratches.
customer_reviews.author: NSP

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. May work for someone else. Made my screen look dirty and peels up very easily. It scratches very easily and seemed very flimsy. Like it was just a piece of square tape. Imagine running your fingernail across a piece of plastic wrap... gives that scratched tear look every time something solid touches it.
customer_reviews.author: Firewife21

customer_reviews.title: Saves my screen from scratches
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Mine did peel up on the corners a big where they start to round off, but it doesn’t bother me too much. It’s nice that it comes with a pack of SIX for a reasonable price. Doesn’t make me feel so bad having to replace it every few months since it came with multiple. It definitely saves my screen from a lot of bumps/potential scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best use up a protector to understand how to apply it
customer_reviews.text: Screen protector does a great job for what I need it for, to protect against scratches. I don't like the bulkier tempered glass and always heard those were more to protect against breaking the screen. I have bigger issues scratching my apple product screens than breaking them. The installation video that they direct you to watch is very helpful to successfully applying the screen protector. It is very important to keep pushing the corners of the protector down during application, as they will pop back up the first couple times after applying pressure. Eventually it all sticks. It even made the small scratch I already put on the glass below appear not there.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Not glass.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews before purchasing. These are not glass protectors. They are a plastic film. The protector went on pretty easy even though the how-to video they direct you to wouldn’t load. However, when I put the watch in its case/band the protector peeled off. The package says they work with cases. Nope. Chalk this up to wasted money and read the reviews next time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Howard

customer_reviews.title: Forms well around the watch
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t too happy that I hadn’t read more into these protectors since I wanted glass. But when I put one on it actually formed to the glass and not lift at any of the corners like many of the others I have used. The prep doesn’t take long and it was pretty easy. Haven’t had any problems since and it’s played well with protective case I have on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a hassle, cloudy finish
customer_reviews.text: I don’t hate this product, but I’m not entirely in love with it either. It has a job and that’s all it’s good for. The installation was a mess, you have to watch a video. Why is that necessary for something as simple as applying a screen protector? In order to apply you must spray it down with solution. You get six in a pack because it may take you two to three tries to get it on correctly. Ten minutes to complete a task that should have taken one is a bit of a hassle. Also, the finish of the screen is cloudy. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Prezzy

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video! I watched it a few times and paused it as I followed along. Liked that is was a 6 pack and it covered a previous scratch that was on there that you can barely see now, really like that. Works very well and protected 3 watches and have back ups when needed. Touch screen works great and you can’t see the film at all. Love that it fits both sizes too.
customer_reviews.author: Alison D. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: 38 mm doesn’t stay on the corners at all
customer_reviews.text: My husband has these same ones for his bigger Apple Watch and they work great, but for some reason the 38 mm ones that I have don’t stay on at all. I’ve gone through 3 and only had the for 2 months. The corners don’t seal and peel up and then get caught in stuff and rip off. I was having to change it every week or so. I got a new brand and it has been on nearly a month with no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Purchase was worth it
customer_reviews.text: I messed up the first protector I tried to apply but I went over the directions carefully again and I got it the second time. It’s doing a good job of preventing scratches to my watch face. One plastic cover lasts quite a while. I’ve had the same cover for a couple of months now and it’s barely starting to lift the tiniest bit on one corner and I use my watch every day. I recommend this product. (I am an actual customer & not paid for review)
customer_reviews.author: Lubec

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: This product cane with a great instructional video to follow. It fits perfectly. Love having it on my watch. The only two downsides are the length of time you need to leave it laying flat after application (12 hours) and the card given to remove bubbles actually scratched the protector on my first two application tries. I did achieve success with no scratches on the third try.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Good protection but makes watch appear less attractive
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job protecting the screen but it's not exactly invisible. I've used less noticeable screen protectors on phones before so that could be improved. Install isn't super easy but not hard either, typical wet install. Good that it comes with multiple sheets for mistakes, just peel it off and use another sheet.
customer_reviews.author: TechHead

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several different brands but this one has been the best. Simple instructions are clearly demonstrated in a video link given. From the start your watch is placed on a protective disc to keep it from moving - allowing for the screen protector to align without difficulty. Your fingers never touch the screen protector with a new ingenious 4 tab application design.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just thicker than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty decent cover for my Apple Watch but you definitely have to push your finger a bit harder than usual when using. There were very few bubbles and it was easy to apply so that was great. I just ended up taking it off because it got annoying having to push on my watch rather than just tapping to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin DesLaurier

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This protector was pretty easy to install, and I didn't see any bubble during installation. You have to be patient and make sure to apply it exactly on the face of your watch, or part will stick out. I do see one tiny bubble now that it's dry, but this was my first time. Very happy with purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mobi's mom

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mess!
customer_reviews.text: Well they have shown to be ok on the scratch resistant on screen but not on themselves! They are amazingly hard to put on!! You waste atleast 2 every time you go to put 1 on! You use half of spray bottle to make the 2 stick! And make a mess along the way! And they don’t go around the watch edges very neatly! What a mess!
customer_reviews.author: maria magallanes

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a week before dust stuck underneath
customer_reviews.text: It lasted for less than a week. Underneath it has fuzz/ dust so it looks terrible when I wear it because somehow it collected dust. I’m very disappointed since I spent 5 minutes putting it on in a complicated process and it also worked under water. Loved it at first but now it looks bad.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best We've Found
customer_reviews.text: This is the second type of screen protector we have tried for our watches. So far we like this one much better than the prior brand. The screen quality is superb. Occasionally, a corner will come up, but if you catch it in time and press it back down there is no issue.
customer_reviews.author: MJWilbs

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Application
customer_reviews.text: Application was a little bit confusing because there were no instructions. You get all the things you need to protect your Watch face, and the screen protector only has 4 numbers on it, so you can peel it accordingly. However, putting it right on the Watch was a little bit difficult and I later found out 2 and 4 were to peel the bottom. At the end I figure it out, but I wish instruction was easy.
customer_reviews.author: sandwichleg

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: They claim that these are “liquid skin” but I found them difficult to manipulate. I watched the video and followed the instructions to the t. I could not get all four corners to stick. I let it sit over night but it looked worse in the morning and even if the corners stuck, there would not have been full coverage on the face of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector has save my watch many times! I have nicked and scratched it many times and if it wasn’t for the protector, I would need a new watch. The marks are still on the protector so if I want them gone I will have to replace it. The only problem I have with these protectors is that they don’t lay flat against the corners of the screen. They kind of lift in the corners but for me it’s not a problem because I also have a silicone buffer on my watch. I like that it came with extras so if I need to replace it quickly, I can.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Does Not work with bumper
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money if you have a bumper installed on the watch. The edges come up within a day or less. Not sure if it would still do it without the bumper, but I will always have the bumper on for added protection. Will be trying a tempered glass that applies to the flat part of my watch and paired with a bumper should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shevie S.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: The product instillation video was easy to follow and I was able to apply the screen protector first try with no errors such as bubbles etc, I have had the screen protector for 2 days now and I don't see any scratches yet.. I would say this definitely beats having a plastic cover around your apple watch making it loose its elegance. You don't even notice the screen protector once its appplied
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Can't Escape the Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video and everything and went through 4 of the screens I sent JUST TRYING TO ESCAPE THE BUBBLES. I could not put this one without there bubbling involved. I cleaned the screen and took off all the dust. I am very disappointed with how hard this product is to get on properly and am just going to buy a screen that pops onto the watch which I should've done in the first place. Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: Not glass; will prevent scratches.
customer_reviews.text: So these are NOT glass as I thought they were. My fault for not checking the description. If you watch the video it’s not hard to install. It will protect from scratches on the screen but probably not from cracking if it’s struck which is what I need. It reminds me of the plastic that comes on new electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Hard to install...and easy to fall off!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! These are terribly hard to install and come off really easily...you’ll go through all 6 of them in a few months! They also don’t provide you with enough wipes to use all 6 and they are not smooth at all! Very noticeable on your watch...would NOT recommend wasting your money in these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Humes

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Good screen protector. Was an interesting install and my screen ended up being a little wonky but I think that was user error. I’ve never done a wet application screen protector before and honestly didn’t realize that’s what this was. I decided to just roll with the first try because it’s not terrible and works fine. So far it’s stayed on, even the edges and protects my screen. It’s been about a month.
customer_reviews.author: afran23

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: The product was very well put together. Came with 6 screen protectors just in case. The video tutorial is very informative and very easy to follow along. Looks very sleek on my apple watch and easy to apply as long as you watch the video and be patient. The seller has a warranty with the product and has been very responsive! Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Y.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: I used the stickers that were given to apply the screen protector and the guide sticker got stuck to the screen protector. the next time I applied the sticker, I used the screen protector that got ruined during the first attempt and stuck it to the second one. That worked for the most part. Once its on the watch its pretty clear for the most part. HARD TO APPLY. THAT IS WHY I RATED THIS WITH THREE STARS. I EVEN WATCHED THE VIDEO THEY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Amber MacLennan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Though the process might take a few minutes to correctly install, it is worth it! The video link that was provided for instruction is must watch in order to properly install (trust me, I messed up the first time). Once complete, you can’t even tell it is on there as it looks so sleek!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good product, slightly messy installation
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a good product for the price (you get 6 screen protectors)! The installation is a little messy, though, which I wasn't expecting. They also only give enough wet/dry cloths and stickers sets for 3 installations, even though it comes with 6 screen protectors. Once on, however, I can barely notice it and can be less stressed about scratching my watch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: After less than one full day of wearing my watch, all 4 corners are starting to lift. Instructions don’t come with the product, you have to look up a video which is frustrating. It says it’s a box of 6, it comes with 6 screen protectors but only 3 wipes for installation?? Installation itself wasn’t difficult but product is cheap. Spend your money on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: work and look great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these screen protectors, they are easy to install, hardly visible on the watch, and have protected my watch face against damage on a few occasions. I play roller derby and wear my watch under my wrist guards and the protectors have held up to that as well. It did start to peel up from around the edges after while, but I felt they lasted a reasonable time and it was easy to peel off and replace.
customer_reviews.author: kara beth

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Waited for a while before I gave my review to make sure that it is really working. This is one of the easiest screen protector that I have used so far. I have tried a couple of screen protectors for my iWatch but they either are hard to install or they start peeling off after a while. The instruction video helps a lot so do watch the video before installing.
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and get a cover.
customer_reviews.text: They kept coming off on the corners of my watch. I did not find that they would stay on the corners even after installing several times. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Arnold

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars, I would. The protector is like a peel off sticker, so you are touching the sticky part before placing it on the watch. Therefore, your finger prints are visible on the screen protector when placed. Get the same brand but the BLUE box, not yellow. I’ve bought this one before & this issue does not happen with this kind.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Prokosch

customer_reviews.title: Edges come up after a few days
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: I’ve had the screen protector on my watch for over a week now. Initially I was unsure. After a day or two realizing the screen was protected and I there was no interference in using the screen, I was happy I put it on. Within a the last day or so, the edges are coming up. Not attractive. I’ll keep the screen protector on for now and will replace with the additional ones I still have since I bought a 6-pack, but I will not reordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B.

product_meta.title: LK 6 Pack Screen Protector for Apple Watch (38mm Series 3/2/1 40mm Series 5 4 Compatible) Max Coverage HD Clear Film Bubble Free Anti-Scratch
feature_bullets: ATTENTION: Apple Watch 40mm Series 5 / 4 Screen Size is same as Apple Watch 38mm Series 3/2/1, only the Screen Display area is 30% bigger. Our screen protector is designed for both Apple Watch 40mm Series 4 / 5 & Apple Watch 38mm Series 3/2/1.There's a gap between screen protector and Apple Watch screen for the case.
Unique Adhesive: Can be washed, reused, reapplied. wet-install method ensures easy, bubble-free and frustration free installation that will leave the film perfectly contoured to any device.
Optically Transparent: 99% HD Clear screen with smooth glass-like surface and "True Touch" feel and keeps the bright and colorful image quality.
Specifically Design: Precise laser cutting technology to offer maximum screen coverage. Material flexibility allows coverage even on curved devices.
Self-Healing: flexible, tough, military-grade thermoplastic urethane, designed to absorb impact.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars8,003 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
